recipe.title: Healthy Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Frozen Yogurt Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: Â½ cup ; mini dark chocolate chips ; (175 g)

steps.step: Combine all ingredients except the chocolate chips into a food processor or high-speed blender, process until consistent color and completely smooth.
Pour into a pan. Mix into dark chocolate chips and smooth into an even layer.

Freeze 2 hours, or until frozen but still a little soft for scooping. (If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping).
Scoop into a bowl and top with your favorite toppings.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Combine all ingredients except the chocolate chips into a food processor or high-speed blender, process until consistent color and completely smooth.
Mix into dark chocolate chips and smooth into an even layer.
Freeze 2 hours, or until frozen but still a little soft for scooping.
(If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping).
Scoop into a bowl and top with your favorite toppings.
